risk_factors: Complex database operations in COMPLEX_DB routes

phase_1_critical_path.focus: Complete FastAPI microservice integration for core team management

phase_2_hybrid_resolution.focus: Resolve hybrid implementation and ensure consistent API patterns

phase_3_complex_operations.focus: Complex database operations and cross-system integrations

phase_4_remaining_routes.focus: Systematic migration of remaining API endpoints

high_dependency_routes.impact: Many project-related routes depend on this core endpoint

high_risk_routes.mitigation: Implement comprehensive file validation and error handling
Use database transactions and implement rollback mechanisms
Implement optimistic locking and inventory reconciliation

general_recommendations: Implement comprehensive error handling for all COMPLEX_DB routes
Add transaction support for multi-table operations
Create rollback mechanisms for failed operations
Implement proper validation for file uploads and storage operations
Add monitoring and logging for all migrated routes
Create automated tests for critical business logic
